snippet: The City Council in Washington will hold a hearing after a memo warning officials of cheating on standardized tests during the chancellorship of Michelle A. Rhee surfaced on Thursday.
abstract: City Council in Washington will hold a hearing after memo surfaces, warning officials of cheating by 191 teachers on standardized tests during chancellorship of Michelle A Rhee; allegations of cheating have dogged Rhee since investigation by USA Today found high rates of erasures on standardized tests at a Washington elementary school.
lead_paragraph: The City Council in Washington will hold a hearing after a memo warning officials of cheating on standardized tests during the chancellorship of Michelle A. Rhee surfaced on Thursday.

headline.seo: Hearing on Test-Cheating Claim in Washington
headline.main: Hearing Set on Cheating Claim in Capital
headline.print_headline: Hearing Set on Cheating Claim in Capital
